segments.text: Well , last night I had a big argument with Ann .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Terrible . It must be something serious . You two are such close friends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now that I look back at it , it wasn't that big a deal . I shouldn't have lost my temper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's just we've been planning to go the beach for a while , and we decided we could both make it this weekend . Then out of nowhere she called me up , said her boyfriend had made plans and that she need to cancel the trip . I was so angry when she told me that I said she didn't care about our friendship at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , but I was so upset . I mean , come on ! Does she have to do everything her boyfriend says ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know she probably feels just as bad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think I was being a little selfish myself . I know they don't get to see each other very often .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , in that case I guess maybe you can be more understanding . You shouldn't let a trivial thing like this stand in the way of your friendship . After all you can go to the beach anytime you want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I'll call later to patch things up .
segments.speaker: S2
